The Invisible Elephant is a symbol of the unseen dangers that lurk in the shadows of our society.
The Invisible Elephant is a representation of the unspoken truths that we all know exist, but refuse to acknowledge.
The Invisible Elephant is a metaphor for the many problems that we ignore and hope will go away.
The Invisible Elephant is a symbol of the unseen pain that so many people are suffering in silence.
The Invisible Elephant is a representation of the unspoken fears that we all have, but refuse to admit.
